00041         *
00042         * @param instr The input file stream.
00043         * @return The integer read from the file.
00044         */
00045         static int8_t ReadInt8(std::ifstream &instr);

00196         static std::string ReadString8(char * &instr);
00197 
00198         /*! Reads a blob from a file (as is; no htonl).  It is the responsibility of the caller to
00199         * convert elements of the blob to system types.
00200         * @param instr The input file stream.
00201         * @param value A returned pointer to the blob.  The caller must delete[] the returned pointer.
00202         * @return The size of the blob read from the file.
00203         */
00204         static int32_t ReadBlob(std::ifstream &instr, const void*& value);
